name: Nubla 2 "M, The City in the Center of the World"
name_original: Nubla 2 "M, The City in the Center of the World"
description:
What if time stopped and the dreams and hopes of everyone could never be fulfilled?
Now, your goal will be the time.

An artistic adventure with a living narrative in which returning lost creativity to a world without identity will be your way forward. Join Illái and Illú through the universe of Nubla solving the puzzles of the time-lapse and make the time go on again.

Enjoy an unforgettable trip inspired by the artistic works of Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum.

features


  • References to the artistic works of the most important artist in history.
  • Interactive dynamic puzzles.
  • Pure living artistic narrative.
  • Play and learn; culture and entertainment.
